short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play a trick to your people, drive them crazy by displaying sometimes a quick but huge trollface while they surf the Internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prank your non geek colleagues and friends, drive them crazy by displaying a trollface from time to time during their web browsing.
